name: covr
description:
fyfill is now "covr"


With covr, you can connect your Spotify account with Figma to use album cover images as fills. You can also put artist names and album titles in text nodes.


The code is completely open source and I will never store any data from you.


Plugin: https://github.com/ph1p/figma-covr

Server: https://github.com/ph1p/covr-server
